channel.title: Know any good Video Editing tools?
channel.description:
Other then Windows Movie Maker, which would not qualify as a good tool. Anyway, itd be fantastic if it were relatively cheap, and even free. Actually free would be best. Yeah, free. But legal free.
Anyway, I've been working on a trailer for BM, and I have a really good vision of what it will be. It will be sad. Really emotionally sad.
So, anyone recommend any good programs? Thanks for your help. Welcome back to the forums BTW. Now we all have the same post count, fellow cockroaches.

item.title: Know any good Video Editing tools?
item.dc:creator: ZakKa
item.description:
Sony Vegas, Simple but still advanced
Powerdirector, simple and just… simple

item.title: Know any good Video Editing tools?
item.dc:creator: The_Assassin47
item.description:
Yes. The Special OP does not approve of the price.
Okay I tried the Avid Free DV program, and the more I do the more furstrated I get. Anything else guys?

I did manage to make the soundtrack for the video with Avid, but the actual video editing is a pain.
Hope you guys like it when I’m done.

Adam I might take you up on your offer to let you fancy it up once its basically done.

Read full topic

item.title: Know any good Video Editing tools?
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Money isn’t an issue on the internet, unless you’re making a commercial product/video, then you need to buy it. If it’s for editing a youtube video, the companies care a lot less if you pirate their software.

Not that I encourage this. Piracy is bad.

item.title: Know any good Video Editing tools?
item.dc:creator: Psyborg
item.description:
There’s a free version of Avid, if memory serves. The interface is a bitch to learn, but after that it’s fairly comprehensive, and relatively customizable. Better than WMM anyway. I use Vegas, but that’s only because I saved up and purchased it for three hundred dollars because I’m not a pirating sonofabitch.

EDIT: Also, Keresh, if you use After Effects as a non-linear editing suite, you’re doing it wrong.

Read full topic
